author: Mélissa Godin
title: Coronavirus Is Closing Borders in Europe and Beyond. What Does That Mean for Refugees?
description: When Wahidullah Rahimi leaves his tent to wander around the refugee camp on the Greek island of Samos, he wears a face mask. But between standing in line alongside other refugees at food distribution centers and sleeping in an unsanitary tent, the 32-year-old…
